item.description:
We finished our 2nd Couch to 5K training session of the year, but who says we have to stop??

Looking to meet people for a run/jog/walk or some sort of combination of them all?  Meet us at Braintree HS on Monday and Wednesday nights at 6:30 for a no pressure group to get in a few or more laps on the track.  This will run through October (no meeting on Halloween or Columbus Day).

Remember, even on your worst walk or run, you are still lapping everyone who didn't get off the couch!  The hardest part is showing up.  :)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Running or Walking or Both at the Track!
